annotations.description: The fans must be pleased with the show they have seen on the pitch today. There was no chance to get bored as the game was very attractive. Let's hope the players won't lose their passion and determination in the future matches. The hosts were largely in control of the game today. The home team played possession football, while the away team tried to find the weakness in their defence using mainly rapid counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.
James McClean (West Brom) unleashes a decent effort from just outside the box which goes narrowly wide of the left post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Craig Gardner (West Brom) is intercepted by Joe Hart.
Craig Gardner (West Brom) serves up a nice cross, but the defence clears the danger. The referee points to the corner flag and West Brom will take a corner.
Craig Gardner (West Brom) crosses the ball into the box from the free kick, but the defence clears the danger.
Nicolas Otamendi (Manchester City) fouls an opponent. At least that's what referee Mike Jones signals. There is a free kick near the sideline to West Brom.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: Fourth official shows 4 min. of added time.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Manuel Pellegrini has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Gael Clichy (Manchester City) replacing Sergio Aguero.
Jonathan Leko (West Brom) sends a teasing cross into the area, but Joe Hart intercepts the ball.
West Brom enjoy a period of possession as they are exchanging some passes and waiting for an opportunity to strike.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Craig Gardner (West Brom) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders.
Joe Hart reacts well to deny a long range free kick from Craig Gardner (West Brom) towards the roof of the net. The ball is out of play. West Brom will have a chance to score from a corner.
Mike Jones blows his whistle for a foul after Nicolas Otamendi (Manchester City) hacks down one of his opponents. That's a free kick to West Brom.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance for today's match is 53920.
A brilliant individual effort! Samir Nasri (Manchester City) tricks his way past challenges into the box and drags his shot narrowly wide of the right post.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Stephane Sessegnon makes way for Jonathan Leko (West Brom).
Chance! Saido Berahino (West Brom) was in a good position inside the box, but he couldn't connect with the pass as it was overhit.

James McClean (West Brom) unleashed a monstrous piledriver. He controlled a pass, glanced up at goal and shot from the edge of the box. It could have been a difficult one for the keeper, but the ball fortunately hit one of the defenders and ball bounced away.
Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) darts into the penalty area to latch on to a pass, and he unleashes a low drive towards the middle of the net, but Ben Foster is alert and denies him.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Joe Hart comes off his line to intercept the corner from Craig Gardner (West Brom).
James Chester (West Brom) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away. The ball goes out for a corner. West Brom can continue in their attacking effort.
Saido Berahino (West Brom) latches on to a lofted pass and strikes the ball! His attempt flies narrowly wide of the right post.
The West Brom players keep the ball and are exchanging a combination of passes. They are waiting for gaps in the defence to open up.

Ambitious effort from Saido Berahino (West Brom). He finds himself in a great position after collecting a precise pass inside the penalty area and goes for goal, but it never troubles the goalkeeper and flies well wide of the right post.
A pass by Jesus Navas (Manchester City) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end.
Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) is offside and the linesman raises his flag.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal 2:1! Samir Nasri (Manchester City) taps home from close range after the rebound fell kindly into his path.
Wow, what an escape. Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) has an effort from inside the box but it's brilliantly blocked.
The Manchester City players are exchanging short passes in an attempt to create a shooting opportunity.

annotations.description: Craig Gardner (West Brom) takes the corner kick and sends a lovely ball into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready and knocks the ball to safety.

Sandro receives a sweet cross inside the box from Stephane Sessegnon (West Brom), but one of the defenders rushes in bravely to intercept the move.

annotations.label: corner

Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) picks up a pass, lines up a shot and strikes from 25 metres out, but Ben Foster thwarts the effort which is headed to the bottom left corner. The ball is out of play. Manchester City win a corner kick.
Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) receives a good pass just outside the box, unleashes a strike from a promising position, but the shot is blocked by the defender.
Manchester City are seeing far more of the ball now.
Fernando (Manchester City) manages to dispossess his opponent of the ball, but he commits a foul in the process and the referee blows his whistle.
Stephane Sessegnon (West Brom) is unable to feed an accurate cross into the box.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The game restarts for the second half.

It was a good decision to watch today's encounter. There has already been more to see prior to the half time break than there is in most games during the full 90 minutes. The home team were mostly in control in the first half. The home team makes a lot of passes and attempts to maintain possession, while the visitors look to counter attack.

annotations.label: whistle

annotations.description: 2 additional min. will be played.

Samir Nasri sends a lovely lofted pass forward that flies over the top of the defence and into the path of Wilfried Bony (Manchester City), but he can't direct his header on target as it flies well wide of the left post.
Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) sends a cross into the box. However, the opponent's defence eliminates the danger by clearing the ball out.

Long passes, short passes and one two passes. Manchester City are showcasing great team work by keeping possession and producing pin point passes from player to player. The opposition's players are finding it very difficult to intercept at the moment.

Welcome to our minute by minute commentary of today's clash. You can enjoy a written form of everything important that will be happening on the pitch. Have fun.

The fans must be pleased with the show they have seen on the pitch today. There was no chance to get bored as the game was very attractive. Let's hope the players won't lose their passion and determination in the future matches. The hosts were largely in control of the game today. The home team played possession football, while the away team tried to find the weakness in their defence using mainly rapid counter attacks.
